titleStmt.title: Advice for the prevention of theft being a short account of the confession and discovery which was made by a condemned prisoner, who was executed the 25th of May, 1687, to William Smythies, curate of St. Giles Cripplegate.
titleStmt.author: Smythies, William, d. 1715.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 4: Cripplegate, May the 26th. 1687. W. Smythies.
Imperfect: creased, stained, and with print show-through.
Reproductions of original in: Bodleian Library.
